metadata.title: CVE-2019-6460 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU Recutils 1.8. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function rec_field_set_name() in the file rec-field.c in librec.a.

criterions.comment: recutils package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
